'Maktubat', 'Mektubat' (Arabic: ÙÚ©ØªÙØ¨Ø§Øª) or 'Makatib', 'Mekatib' (Farsi:
ÙÚ©Ø§ØªÛØ¨), commonly translated as 'The Letters' may refer to the following works:
*Makatib (Maktubat al-Rabbani), the book containing Rumi's letters to his
disciples, family members, and men of state and of influence
* Maktubat, a collection of Ahmad Sirhindi letters to Mughal rulers and other
  contemporaries
